txt.en: The sound of heavy footsteps shakes the rocks around an encampment of Lumrog. Hill-trolls have settled here and they pose a danger to those in the area.

The sound of the trolls stomping around Lumrog has quieted some, thanks to your efforts. Lumrog will never truly be safe, but you have lessened the danger these massive creatures pose for the residents of Misthallow, and that is a good deed.
The sound of heavy footsteps shakes the rocks around an encampment of Lumrog. Hill-trolls have settled here and they pose a danger to those in the area.
Lumrog has long been a home to a group of hill-trolls in Misthallow. The sound of their heavy footsteps shakes the rocks around their encampment striking fear into the hearts of the nearby residents.

Hill-trolls have settled in the Misthallow, and the sound of their heavy footsteps shakes the rocks around their encampment. These creatures pose a danger to any who draw too near to Lumrog and should be defeated.
